{{- Parameters: |api|: the schema for the API that the function belongs to |function|: the schema for the function |parentName|: name of the parent object of the function |disableLink|: if not null, no link will be shown for types -}} {{?r:function.returns}}{{+partials.variable_type type:r disableLink:disableLink/}} {{/}}{{?api}}{{api.namespace}}.{{/}}{{?parentName}}{{parentName}}.{{/}}{{function.name}}({{#p:function.parameters}}{{+partials.parameter_item parameter:p disableLink:disableLink/}}{{^p.last}}, {{/}}{{/}})
